word:
FIRST: 


     THAT WE ORGANIZE A DEPARTMENT OF THE FOOD BUSINESS FOR THE DIRECT SUPPLY OF THE MANUFACTURED HEALTH FOODS, ALSO FRUITS, LEGUMES, HEALTH APPLIANCES, LITERATURE, ETC., TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE CALIFORNIA MEDICAL MISSIONARY AND BENEVOLENT ASS'N., STOCKHOLDERS OF HEALDSBURG COLLEGE AND PACIFIC PRESS, AND THE MEMBERS OF THE ADVENTIST CHURCH GENERALLY.
